title: authenticated attacker
extract: An authenticated security scan is vulnerability testing performed as a logged-in (authenticated) user. ... Visibility into those security holes helps administrators identify what needs to be done to ensure that should an attacker gain access to the network or a user account, important accounts and data will be protected.
extract_html: An authenticated security scan is vulnerability testing performed as a logged-in (authenticated) user. ... Visibility into those security holes helps administrators identify what needs to be done to ensure that should an attacker gain access to the network or a user account, important accounts and data will be protected.
